title: A Lung CT Foundation Model Facilitating Disease Diagnosis and Medical Imaging
details: Z Gao, G Zhang, H Liang, J Liu, L Ma, T Wang, Y Guo… - medRxiv, 2025
abstract: The concomitant development and evolution of lung computed tomography (CT) and artificial intelligence (AI) has allowed non-invasive lung imaging to be a key part of the clinical care of patients with major diseases, such as lung cancer. However, the …
